zserio.runtime.io

Interface Writer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    InitializeOffsetsWriter, PackableWriter

    public interface Writer
    Interface for writing to bit stream for classes generated by Zserio.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long initializeOffsets()
      Initializes indexed offsets.
      long initializeOffsets(long bitPosition)
      Initializes indexed offsets.
      void write(BitStreamWriter out)
      Writes this objects to the given bit stream.

    • Method Detail

      • initializeOffsets

        long initializeOffsets()
        Initializes indexed offsets. It is supposed that the current bit stream position is zero.
        Returns:
        Updated bit stream position which points to the first bit after the array.

      • initializeOffsets

        long initializeOffsets(long bitPosition)
        Initializes indexed offsets.
        Parameters:
        bitPosition - Current bit stream position.
        Returns:
        Updated bit stream position which points to the first bit after the array.

      • write

        void write(BitStreamWriter out)
    throws java.io.IOException
        Writes this objects to the given bit stream.
        Parameters:
        out - Bit stream writer to use.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws if the writing failed.
